name: Gelli Factory
description:
This game was made for the Gelli jam, organized by Fairlii for reaching 10k.

All of the assets and code was created during the jam, except the sound effects.

!WARNING! At the end, it tries to open a link, but it only works on firefox for some reason, bc chrome blocks it. It also tries to copy the link, which works 50% of the time. ¯\(°_o)/¯
